_comment: Data sourced from the International Dark-Sky Association (IDA) official list of International Dark Sky Places. URL: https://www.darksky.org/our-work/conservation/idsp/
_note: Bortle class and SQM values are estimates based on designation type and site descriptions. Last updated: 2025-11-18. For the most up-to-date information and official designations, visit the IDA website.
